answers.answer: Praying for you...I'm also 10 wks with my first and I have high blood pressure, but I know God will see me through.

Hello I am 11 Weeks & 4days lol this is my 3rd I have 2girls hopping 4a boy but of God thinks I need a 3rd girl thn he knows best ;) lol don't be scared everything will be fine I will be praying 4u & the baby ;) Hope 2 talk with ya soon keep us updated

Hi.. I'm 9weeks 3days! I also had problems my first pregnancy ((preeclampsia)) but my doc says so far so good with this baby! Although, I do like to light candles and say a little prayer on them for my baby at least one a week!

question: Hi I'm new here...I'm 10wks pregnant I very scared but still happy to be pregnant again (2nd) i had problems my last time around hope things go better this time pray for me!!
title: new here
